{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R7900 |revision=P
(Nighthawk X6S) |series=AC3000 |fcc_date=03/09/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H359 |manuf_rev=T00 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY316400363 |pcb_id=U12H359T00 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4906;BCM4906KFEBG, TK1647, 636445-14 Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLWG, UE1708 P30, 463-14 3; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLWG, UE1708 P30, 463-14 3; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLWG, UE1708 P30, 463-14 3; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Qorvo (RFMD);RFPA5218;3Q, WRJA;3; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module (FEM);Qorvo (RFMD);QPF4519;QPF4519, 58ZE;6; |flags=MU-MIMO, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• 2x '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.) :• 1x '''450''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''3000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X6S Smart WiFi Router with MU-MIMO}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R7900P.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R7900P}} Most of the information on this page was copied from the [[Netgear R8000P]] since the FCC ID is the same. The Netgear Board ID for both is ''U12H359T00_NETGEAR'' (OEM: [[Foxconn]]). The 1.1.3.2 firmware downloads for the R7900P and the R8000P are identical :which suggests that features may be disabled using other means. This router appears to be a feature-limited R8000P [[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices|exclusively for Costco]]. :Changes from the R8000P to this R7900P include the removal of the USB 2.0 port and :of NitroQAM for both the 2.4GHz and 5GHz radios which reduces the maximum speeds :from 750Mbps to 450Mbps for 802.11n and from 1625Mbps to 1300Mbps for 802.11ac. *Debug URL: http://192.168.1.1/debug.htm ===More Info=== *[https://www.costco.com/NETGEAR-Nighthawk-X6S-AC3000-MU-MIMO-Smart-Wi-Fi-Router.product.100369549.html On '''costco.com'''] ===See also=== :[[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices]] *[[Netgear R7900]] *[[Netgear R7900P]] *[[Netgear R7960P]] *[[Netgear R8000]] *[[Netgear R8000P]] __NOTOC__
